title: Donation of a new Bhabhatron ? II Telecobolt Unit by the Indian Government to Sri Lanka for the use of the General Hospital, Hambantota
decision_details: - Cabinet approval has already been granted to accept the above donation from India for the usage for Cancer Therapy at the General Hospital, Hambantota. This Unit is to be delivered by the Indian Authorities during the month of December.  Cabinet approval was granted to exempt this Unit from all taxes and duties.
